backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining Valentine color palette and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling page transitions, loading overlay, ambient effects, and music controls.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Container for ambient animated elements plus a bouncing teddy emoji.
No button that jumps to random screen positions when clicked.
Full-screen loading overlay with pulsing heart animation.
Music control UI for play/pause and mute using background music hook.
Image with rounded corners and a fallback placeholder on load error.
Styled Valentine-themed button built on shadcn UI button.
Page layout with centered Valentine card and footer attribution.
Modal dialog celebrating a Yes response with hearts and emojis.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Spawns and cleans up Valentine-themed DOM animations like falling hearts, sparkles, roses, kisses, and cursor hearts on intervals.
Manages background audio playback, autoplay detection, mute toggling, and user-gesture fallback.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Contains Pages 1â€“5 with romantic text, images, navigation, and Yes/No interaction logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, Valentine color variables, theming, and custom animations like fade, pulse, and bounce.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, Valentine color tokens, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, architecture notes, features, and state metadata for the Valentine web experience.
